data.title: Esperar etymology in Spanish
data.meta_description: Spanish word esperar comes from Proto-Indo-European *spehâ-, Latin spes (Expectaâ¦
data.text: esperar Spanish (es) (intransitive) to expect (a baby). (intransitive) to hope. (intransitive) to wait. (transitive) to expect, look for (often with a verb in the indicative). (transitive) to hope for, hope to (often with a verb in the subjunctive). (transitive) to wait to, wait for, await.
